name: Bane
desc: Enemies take –1 on attack rolls and saves against fear.

name: Bless
desc: Allies gain +1 on attack rolls and saves against fear.

name: Bless Water
desc: Makes holy water.

name: Cause Fear
desc: One creature of 5 HD or less flees for 1d4 rounds.

name: Command
desc: One subject obeys selected command for 1 round.

name: Comprehend Languages
desc: You understand all spoken and written languages.

name: Cure Light Wounds
desc: Cures 1d8 damage + 1/level (max +5).

name: Curse Water
desc: Makes unholy water.

name: Deathwatch
desc: Reveals how near death subjects within 30 ft. are.

name: Cause Fear
desc: One creature of 5 HD or less flees for 1d4 rounds.

name: Detect Chaos/Evil/Good/Law
desc: Reveals creatures, spells, or objects of selected alignment.

name: Detect Undead
desc: Reveals undead within 60 ft.

name: Divine Favor
desc: You gain +1 per three levels on attack and damage rolls.

name: Doom
desc: One subject takes –2 on attack rolls, damage rolls, saves, and checks.

name: Deathwatch
desc: Reveals how near death subjects within 30 ft. are.

name: Endure Elements
desc: Exist comfortably in hot or cold regions.

name: Entropic Shield
desc: Ranged attacks against you have 20% miss chance.

name: Hide from Undead
desc: Undead can't perceive one subject/level.

name: Inflict Light Wounds
desc: Touch deals 1d8 damage +1/level (max +5).

name: Magic Stone
desc: Three stones gain +1 on attack, deal 1d6 +1 damage.

name: Magic Weapon
desc: Weapon gains +1 bonus

name: Obscuring Mist
desc: Fog surrounds you.

name: Protection from Chaos/Evil/Good/Law
desc: +2 to AC and saves, plus additional protection against selected alignment

name: Remove Fear
desc: Suppresses fear or gives +4 on saves against fear for one subject + one per four levels.

name: Sanctuary
desc: Opponents can't attack you, and you can't attack.

name: Shield of Faith
desc: Aura grants +2 or higher deflection bonus.

name: Summon Monster I
desc: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.
